bug.author: JohnGiorgi
bug.summary: KeyError when trying to follow provided train_entity_linker.py script
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>How to reproduce the behaviour</denchmark-h>
Simply run the provided <denchmark-link:https://github.com/explosion/spaCy/blob/master/examples/training/pretrain_kb.py>pretrain_kb.py</denchmark-link> and <denchmark-link:https://github.com/explosion/spaCy/blob/master/examples/training/train_entity_linker.py>train_entity_linker.py</denchmark-link> scripts. E.g. <denchmark-code>python pretrain_kb.py -m en_core_web_lg -n 1 -o ./tmp python train_entity_linker.py ./tmp/kb ./tmp/vocab -o ./tmp -n 1 </denchmark-code>
During the execution of the second command, a KeyError is raised with the following traceback <denchmark-code>Created blank 'en' model with vocab from 'tmp/vocab' Loaded Knowledge Base from 'tmp/kb' ('Russ Cochran his reprints include EC Comics.', 'Russ Cochran captured his first major title with his son as caddie.', 'Russ Cochran has been publishing comic art.', "Russ Cochran was a member of University of Kentucky's golf team.") ({'links': {(0, 12): {'Q7381115': 1.0, 'Q2146908': 0.0}}}, {'links': {(0, 12): {'Q7381115': 0.0, 'Q2146908': 1.0}}}, {'links': {(0, 12): {'Q7381115': 1.0, 'Q2146908': 0.0}}}, {'links': {(0, 12): {'Q7381115': 0.0, 'Q2146908': 1.0}}}) Traceback (most recent call last): File "train_entity_linker.py", line 167, in <module> plac.call(main) File "/Users/johngiorgi/miniconda3/envs/el/lib/python3.7/site-packages/plac_core.py", line 367, in call cmd, result = parser.consume(arglist) File "/Users/johngiorgi/miniconda3/envs/el/lib/python3.7/site-packages/plac_core.py", line 232, in consume return cmd, self.func(*(args + varargs + extraopts), **kwargs) File "train_entity_linker.py", line 127, in main sgd=optimizer, File "/Users/johngiorgi/miniconda3/envs/el/lib/python3.7/site-packages/spacy/language.py", line 515, in update proc.update(docs, golds, sgd=get_grads, losses=losses, **kwargs) File "pipes.pyx", line 1219, in spacy.pipeline.pipes.EntityLinker.update KeyError: (0, 12) </denchmark-code>
There is another closed issue (<denchmark-link:https://github.com/explosion/spaCy/issues/4469>#4469</denchmark-link> ) that reports this same problem. Suggestions are to use the latest version of SpaCy (I tried with and ) and to update the line <denchmark-code>kb = KnowledgeBase(vocab=nlp.vocab) </denchmark-code>
in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/explosion/spaCy/blob/48ea2e8d0ff6e46f65761425c24369c5d4ac30e1/examples/training/pretrain_kb.py#L57>pretrain_kb.py</denchmark-link> with <denchmark-code>kb = KnowledgeBase(vocab=nlp.vocab, entity_vector_length=64) </denchmark-code>
This solution did not work for me (I recieve the same error as above). <denchmark-h:h2>Your Environment</denchmark-h>
spaCy version: 2.2.2 Platform: Darwin-19.0.0-x86_64-i386-64bit Python version: 3.7.5

comments.comment: Thanks for the very helpful report, <denchmark-link:https://github.com/JohnGiorgi>@JohnGiorgi</denchmark-link> ! The example scripts got outdated after the last refactor of the EL pipeline, which assumes the entities are properly set in the document. To simulate this, I added an EntityRuler to the example script, but for a realistic case you'd need to have a proper NER module. I also created a more friendly warning than the one you ran into ... PR <denchmark-link:https://github.com/explosion/spaCy/pull/4789>#4789</denchmark-link> contains the fixes. Once merged, feel free to try the code again and let me know if there still would be any issues.

Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/svlandeg>@svlandeg</denchmark-link> , Thanks for the PR! Sorry, this took a while, but I re-ran the scripts and now face a thinc.exceptions.ShapeMismatchError when running the latest version of the pretrain_kb.py script. I opened another issue regarding this error (<denchmark-link:https://github.com/explosion/spaCy/issues/4876>#4876</denchmark-link> )
This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
